name: TRUE INDULGENCE IN HALONG BAY - 02D01N - **SUMMER PROMOTION**
description: "Ha Long Bay (Descending Dragon Bay) is a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of Vietnam's most popular places to visit. Ha Long Bay covers an area of 1,500 km2, including 1,960 limestone islets and karsts which rise majestically out of the emerald blue waters of the Gulf of Tonkin."
